page.title: 04Worminghall
page.content: Worminghall has one church.Most people like it because it is very small and colourful.It has many stained glass windows.The pub in Worminghall is called the Clifden Arms.It has a that_ ched roof and the people that own it are very friendly.The pub has a kind of playground at the back,with a shoe slide and a fort and there are some swings as well.There is a small food market in Worminghall called Q'S because the Quartlys own it.It sells most household goods.Most of the houses in Worminghall are very pretty apart from the council houses which are very old and scruffy.The oldest buildings in Worminghall are the Alms houses and the church.Most people in Worminghall are very friendly.The road going through the village is not very busy and it is quite quiet.It is very good for bike riding.
